title: Safeguard America's sovereignty
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

Most Democrats today favor open borders. And open borders, by definition, would result in the United States ceasing to exist as a sovereign nation.

This and other such policies and behaviors by Democrats favor the globalist, not the American. As a result, they are anti-American. To be called anti-American and/or un-American is a heavy call. Well, these are heavy times. When shoes fit, they fit, whether the wearer is well-informed or not.

President Trump is fighting to restore America’s integrity in world politics and its own sovereignty, just as Great Britain is fighting to regain its own integrity and sovereignty from the European Union.

Democrats and the leftist progressives of the world are working to destroy the nation-state with the plan of world government. It’s what the ongoing “climate change” discussion is truly about and has been about since the 1970s: controlling every country from the strongest to the weakest.

In the United States, Democrats prefer to apologize for the success, strength and history of America, as well as the good the country does in the world. It’s the only way to explain their behavior since day one, when a newly elected American president said simply, “America first.”

When Democrats riot in the streets over the overdue idea of reclaiming American sovereignty, there is not much else that needs to be said. Let the chips fall where they will.

GARY A. GUBISCH

Columbia, Md.
